description.h2: Supported Versions of XBRL Standard Taxonomies.
description.p: Refer to the SEC's public website (http://www.sec.gov/info/edgar/edgartaxonomies.shtml) for an up-to-date listing of standard taxonomy files that are supported by EDGAR, their locations, required namespaces, and where appropriate, the relevant EDGAR form types.
REMARK: There is no such section 6.22.4, it is only here to make sure that ex-101's are validated even for SOI and RR taxonomies.

variation.name: Precision attribute on element where filing has SOI 2008 and DEI 2008, NOGOOD
